attributes.action: Exert Diplomatic Press on France and Austria for their lack of respect for freedom of speech
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Diplomatic pressure should be exerted by Britain on France and
Austria for their laws against denying the Hollocost and Armenian
genocide respectively, regardless of the facts people should
have the right to debate issues in an open forum

As Britain is a key player in the EU we have an obligation to help
build the future European Union and it must be built on basic common values, one basic value that is absolutely key is the freedom of speech
